# talkpy

talkpy is a Python library for dealing with word pluralization.

## Installation

Use the package manager pip install talkpy to install foobar.

```bash
pip install talkpy
```

## Usage

```python
import talkpy

talk("Hi") #Male
talkgirl("Hi") #Female
```
